subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Arizona Diamondbacks Manager Bob Melvin seeks out pitcher Micah Owings, who was batting .417 (10 for 24) through Friday, on the days he is not starting.
snippet: Arizona Diamondbacks Manager Bob Melvin seeks out pitcher Micah Owings, who was batting .417 (10 for 24) through Friday, on the days he is not starting.
